attributes.action: give us an in/out referendum on leaving the EU
attributes.additional_details:
If Mr Cameron is so sure Britain neeeds to be in the EU, then please give us a referendum so we can show you our support for your opinion

A referendum on whether the Majority of British voters would happily take our chances as an independent nation once again could decide the next Uk government

Lets vote whether we stay or go ... NOW !!
